keywords: Granola,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Yoghurt & Granola Pots with Passionfruit Honey Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cups Jalna Pot Set Greek Natural Yoghurt
2 cups Jordans Crunchy Granola Bursting with Berries

recipeInstructions.text: Mix honey and passionfruit pulp in an airtight container. Refrigerate overnight to allow flavours to infuse.
Divide yoghurt among 4 x 350ml glasses. Divide half of the honey mixture among glasses, then top with granola. Drizzle with remaining honey mixture, then serve.
